Data Cleaners¶

Functions which cleanes data from DanMax : measument data, Haldor Topsøe: MS data, Heater data, Flow data.

functions.cleaners.fill_timegaps(df_in, timestamp_name='XRDTimeStamp', threshold=30, freq='10S', fill_vals=nan)¶

Function which fills in time series dataframes where time data is missing.

Args:

df_in (dataframe): Timeseries Dataframe with gaps in the time sequency. timestamp_name (str, optional): Column containing the time stamps. threshold (int, optional): Time gap duration threshold in seconds. freq (str, optional): Time frequency for filling in the time gaps. Default to “10S”. fill_vals (np.nan, optional): Value to fill in the gaps.

Returns:

(dataframe): fill_timegaps
